prompt.content:
Using Palantir's Q2 2024 earnings release, calculate the company's Adjusted EBITDA for the quarter. Begin with GAAP operating income, then adjust for:
 Depreciation & Amortization
 Stock-based compensation
 Employer payroll taxes related to stock-based compensation
 Exclude any other non-recurring items not listed. Provide the final figure in $M, rounded to two decimal places.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Uses GAAP operating income of $105.339 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"States the operating income pertains to the three-month period ended June 30, 2024"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Includes depreciation and amortization of $8.056 million"},{"criteria":"Includes stock-based compensation of $141.764 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Includes employer payroll taxes related to stock-based compensation of $6.464 million"},{"criteria":"Starts the Adjusted EBITDA calculation from GAAP operating income and adds the listed adjustments","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Reports an unrounded Adjusted EBITDA total of $261.623 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Reports a final rounded Adjusted EBITDA of $261.62 million (2 decimal points of precision)"},{"criteria":"Uses only the listed adjustments and does not include any other non-recurring items","operator":"correctness"}]
